Introduction

Back to Contents

rgcambreakout is an R package with functions to breakout new regions in the GCAM datasystem.

Citation

Back to Contents

Installation Guide

Back to Contents

  1. Download and install:
    • R (https://www.r-project.org/)
    • R studio (https://www.rstudio.com/)
  2. Open R studio:
install.packages(“devtools”)
devtools::install_github(“JGCRI/rgcambreakout”)

How to guides

Back to Contents

A detailed step-by-step walkthrough and how-to guide is provided on the How-to page.
